group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study design for Sanger sequencing was discussed with the accredited Medical Ethics Review Committee of the University Medical Centre Groningen. The committee waived full ethical evaluation. All the patients in this clinical cohort consented to use of residual material and data.

funder.name: Junior Scientific Masterclass, University Medical Center Groningen
